name: Vector Chaos
description:
Vector Chaos is an arcade game where you, the player, must avoid all incoming collisions on a grid-style system by predicting where collisions will occur with some fairly simplistic but engaging 'mental arithmetic'. How many 'waves' can you make it through?

Vector Chaos was developed during the  2022 'Score-Jam' . Do be warned there may be some issues with screen scaling at the moment; there simply wasn't enough time to test it on multiple devices.
